Common.privacyPolicyNotice: By using this website, you agree to Plant-for-the-Planet's
Common.verifyEmailText: To secure your account, we need to verify your email. Please check your inbox or spam/junk folder for a confirmation email and then continue to login.
Common.verifyEmailInfo: If you didn’t receive an email please try logging in again and we’ll send you another email.
Common.redeemPopup: Received a Tree Gift? Please log in to redeem your trees.
Common.alternativelyEditProfile: Alternatively you can mark your profile private by visiting Edit Profile.
Common.deleteAccountConsent: By clicking "Delete", I am requesting Plant-for-the-Planet to delete all data associated with my Plant-for-the-Planet account. Donation data may be kept for up to eight years. Trees I have registered will not be removed, however, will be anonymized and can't be claimed again.
Common.deleteIrreversible: I also understand that account deletion of {email} is irreversible.
Common.deleteAccountMessage: To continue with deletion, please type `{delete}`
Common.forbidden: You are not allowed to view this page!
Common.connectionError: Could not reach the server. Please check your internet connection.
Common.deleteCondition: Before proceeding, make sure you've cancelled all subscriptions.
Common.tooManyRequest: Too many requests. Please wait and try again later or contact the system administrator for assistance.
Common.internalServerError: Internal Server Error - Please try again later!
Common.serviceUnavailable: App is undergoing maintenance, please check status.plant-for-the-planet.org for details
Common.generic_error: Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
Common.reviewInfo: The project was inspected in a multiday field review in {reviewMonth} and fulfills our <standardsLink>standards.</standardsLink>
Common.top_project_standards_fulfilled: The project inspection revealed that this project fulfilled at least 12 of the 19 Top Project <standardsLink>standards.</standardsLink>
Common.disabledDonateButtonText: The project does not currently accept donations. This may be because it is fully funded, has not yet been reviewed or does not currently meet all our project standards, or chooses to use the platform exclusively for its transparency tools.
Common.salesforceDisabledDonateButtonText: The project does not currently accept donations.

navbarMenu.organisationDescription: Since 2007, our community of 11 organisations works to empower young people to fight the climate crisis and restore forests.

menuitem.platformDescription: Why we built this and how it works
menuitem.redeemCodeDescription: From Tree Certificate or The Change Chocolate
menuitem.supportDescription: Keep our tools free for everyone
menuitem.restorationAdviceDescription: free advice for restoration & conservation programs
